articles.title: Wholesale Inflation Quickens To 2.03% In January From 1.22% In December - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The index of fuel & power group increased by 5.84 per cent and manufactured products index increased by 1.54 per cent.

articles.title: Tesla's Plans For In And Around Bengaluru-What's Coming Up - NDTV
articles.description: Tesla Inc. is closing in on an agreement to make electric vehicles in India for the first time, opening up a new growth opportunity after founder Elon Musk set up production in the U.S. and China.
articles.content:
